Player History
Drafted in 3rd round, 77th overall pick, by Gashouse in 1977...
Earned first career win on 5/16/1982...
Injured on 10/19/1984 with a Strained Back Muscle, out for one week...
Injured on 6/22/1985 with a Pulled Bicep Tendon, out for 3 weeks...
Traded from Gashouse to Bay City on 7/26/1987 (Going to GHG: P T. Prahl, C W. Prindle. Going to BC: P W. Smith)...
Signed as a free agent by West Texas on 2/25/1988 to a 3-year deal worth $3,413,606 per year...
Signed as a free agent by Bay City on 4/7/1991 to a 1-year deal worth $712,000 per year...
Signed as a free agent by Gashouse on 2/18/1992 to a 3-year deal worth $3,349,000 per year...
